attributes.review: I had to keep redownloading it because it wouldn’t stay on my phone, I also seen a very big orange man with butthole lips. I kept feeing watched and I turned around and There was Mr. Orange himself, deff do not recommend.
attributes.title: Bad to the bone

attributes.review: I got this app today and all it does is crash my ohone and drain my battery!!! If there was a 0 star option I would pick that!
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: I opened the app and it kept crashing. I also didn’t understand how to work it. Horrible set up and bad experience
attributes.title: It was horrible

attributes.review: Keeps crashing my phone. Every time I open it to support my great daddy leader Trump my phone crashes, my Apple wallet gets wiped and a bear comes and slaps me in the face without consent.
attributes.title: Doesn’t work

attributes.review: Kept making my phone crash and made me have to restart several times. Not pleased.
attributes.title: App is horribly made, apparently

attributes.review: This app is terrible, it takes forever to download and for some reason their is an orange racist homophobic male on their. Would not recommend. Hide your kids hide your wife. #BLM
attributes.title: Worst app for the worst president🧚🏽‍♀️

attributes.review: I decided to download this app to see what it would do and then it just make my cell phone Crash a lot of time don’t recommend it :<
attributes.title: Bad

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to get only the finest and unbiased news source, but then it just showed a bunch of white supremacy, misogynistic, homophobic propaganda? I will not be downloading this app ever again, no sir!
attributes.title: Terrible service

attributes.review: I downloaded the app to get updated on more news, but honestly the app crashes all the time and it’s just the worst application ever, very bad execution.
attributes.title: Honestly Really Bad

attributes.review: Terrible app. Makes you enter your phone number and then texts you to ask for money 3-5 times a day. Don’t waste your time with it!
attributes.title: Money-sucking app
